data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Finistère.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Finistère, Bretagne, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Finistère, Bretagne, France to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Finistère, Bretagne, France.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 925,400 people living in Finistère, Bretagne, France. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Concarneau
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Concarneau, Bretagne, France.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Finistère.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 565,901 people in the county of Finistère who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.section_summary:
the county of Finistère, Bretagne, France has a population of 925,400.

We estimate Finistère has 11,371 people who might know Jesus, 565,901 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 348,129 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Finistère.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
